body_html: Thoughts: We already have too many different methods for batching that don't play together super-well. @jsimsa is working on a new transformation that will subsume Dataset.batch() and Dataset.padded_batch() by allowing the caller to specify how the batch elements are reduced into one or more tensors. It should be possible to implement this proposed transformation in Jiri's framework, and we'll keep it in mind when providing synatactic sugar for common reducers.
